title: America's two major political parties are simply too big
description: Lee Drutman, Senior Fellow at New America and author of "Breaking the Two-Party Doom Loop" plus Nick Troiano, executive director of Unite America, talk about the future of nonpartisan primaries and ranked choice voting general election.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Lee Drutman, Senior Fellow at New America and author of "Breaking the Two-Party Doom Loop" plus Nick Troiano, executive director of Unite America, talk about the future of nonpartisan primaries and ranked choice voting general election.
itunes:title: America's two major political parties are simply too big
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: Ranked-choice, the end of primaries and other ways to realign the political parties
itunes:subtitle: Ranked-choice, the end of primaries and other ways to realign the political parties
